name: MBCaptureUX
summary: A delightful UX component for document capture
description: The BlinkID Capture iOS SDK gives you the ability to auto-capture high quality images of identity documents in a user-friendly way. The SDK provides you with a rectified image of the document that ensures high success rate in extracting document text or verifying the document validity.
